name: Seungri Simulator
description:
Are you tired of so-called "simulator" games that cut corners for the sake of appeasing casual gamers, and don't accurately recreate the experience that they claim to simulate?  Then you've come to the right place!  There's no compromise on realism in "Seungri Simulator", the new computer game by Kpopalypse, which throws you daringly into the shoes of BigBang's Seungri!  Marvel as a day in Seungri's life is accurately recreated, in this no-holds-barred simulator tour-de-force!

If you enjoyed this game, or at least appreciated its existence in these cruel times, please consider donating to the Kpopalypse Patreon.

Thanks to Az5he6ch for web hosting.
